liveFeeds.title: Basspistol
liveFeeds.shortDescription: The Outernational Music Syndicate - established in 2010 as a pro-active reaction to everything that is broken in the music-industry. Carrying the values of the Creative Commons. We believe in Music. https://basspistol.com/
liveFeeds.longDescription: The Outernational Music Syndicate - established in 2010 as a pro-active reaction to everything that is broken in the music-industry. Carrying the values of the Creative Commons. We believe in Music. https://basspistol.com/
